ARLIN Adversarial Reinforcement Learning Model Interrogation =================================

ARLIN is an open-source Python library for researchers within both the explainable AI (XAI) and adversarial AI (AdvAI) fields. It utilizes matplotlib and networkx to create meaningful metric visualizations for researchers to identify vulnerabilities within trained reinforcement learning (RL) models and offers a simple and intuitive API along with a modular code architecture.

Note

This project is under active development through 2023 under the Decision Science ECRP.
